company.workstations

Class Workstation

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • company.workstations.Workstation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccessoriesPost, BodyPost, CargoPost, CertificationPost, DriveTrainPost

    public abstract class Workstation
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Represents any workstation in this company. A workstation can contain an order and a log, showing which tasks were already performed during this cycle and how long it took to perform them.

      • setOrder

        public void setOrder(Order current)
        Sets the current order in this workstation to the given order.

      • getOrder

        public Order getOrder()
        Returns:
        the current job of this workstation

      • isReady

        public boolean isReady()
        Returns:
        true if all tasks are completed for the current order in this workstation

      • getWorktime

        public int getWorktime()
        Returns:
        the time in minutes that has been spent performing tasks this cycle.

      • getPendingTasks

        public java.util.Set<Task> getPendingTasks()
        Returns:
        a set of tasks that still need to be completed for the current car. If no car is present, returns an empty set.

      • getAllTasks

        public java.util.Set<Task> getAllTasks()
        Returns:
        a set containing all tasks for the current order, finished or not, that can be performed in this workstation, or an empty set if there is no current order in this workstation.
